places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Grand Park
address: Bank Street, Opp. SBI, Amalapuram, Andhra Pradesh 533201, India

reviews.text:
Attended a friend's wedding. Self drove here and stayed at this hotel with another friend.

Business/family atmosphere.

Comfortable, clean rooms.

24-hours hot water for bathing.

Mattress in the bed was very, very soft for my liking, but that was a variable nares in my preference.

Good parking.

Lift facility.

Was a comfortable 2-night stay.

1and 2nd mar 2024 i stayed with family room 410 for my brother sons wedding.Room and toilet room ok but water not chocked out from comet often problem.second one no chairs,no catle for heat water for coffe or tea making.minimum facilty nil.some what poor maitance, room charges that not much worth

Came here for a campus recruitment drive. Rooms are good, clean and comfortable. Bathroom was also clean and well maintained. This hotel does not have a restaurant attached. So even coffee and tea have to be ordered through room service. Room service is slow so order well in advance. It may take 40 min to 1 hour to service the order. Location was good and located centrally with ample parking place

Location almost in the centre of the city. Rooms are spacious. Priced on higher side. no kettle, free drinking water, toiletries...etc are not provided & washrooms could be little bigger. Their function hall too is good as we had an event planned recently. No service lift available for the event planner get big items.
Staff  behavior was not good I'll give these for 5*  rating not all some persons

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Subhagruha
address: Main Rd, Amalapuram, Andhra Pradesh 533201, India

reviews.text: Excellent room. 5 star rated room. Hot water, TV and AC are provided. With one large bed and we took an extra bed. We accommodated with 3 adult and 2 kids

Very clean and well maintained rooms. Bathroom fixtures are top notch. Water pressure is more than adequate. Hot and cold water available.

Mosquitoes are a problem in the lobby and lift. But the management provides all-out mosquito repellent for every room. Stairwells require more lighting. Pillow covers need to be cleaned more thoroughly.

Reception staff are very polite. Room service is prompt and considerate. The experience is comparable to what you get in Holiday Inn hotels in the US.
Well space and maintenance, classic ambience. One more interesting my marriage was done on this hotel. Good service with reasonable price. Recommended this
rooms are hygenic..but too much costly in this area
All good expect the cost little bit more compared with other hotels

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Satkar - Best Restaurant and Hotel
address: near VPC, behind Busstand, Amalapuram, Andhra Pradesh 533201, India

reviews.text: I had an exceptional experience at this hotel. The ambience exudes comfort, the food is delectable, and the room services are top-notch. The staff's friendliness made my stay even more enjoyable; they went above and beyond, offering valuable advice on places to visit. Highly recommended for a delightful stay.

It's located to a road connected to main road. Little hard to find out for new visitors.  Decent parking area. It's next to movie theaters,  If you are visiting at the show closing time, lot of traffic will be there.  Inside ambiance is fine, Food taste is also ok. bedsheets are not clean, dirty pillows, repairs in bathrooms. better than any other restaurants in the place. Good variety of food.

Hotel Sarkar is an absolute gem for those seeking an amazing party spot! The boarding experience is top-notch, akin to a three-star hotel, with courteous and mannered staff who truly elevate the stay. The management's dedication and friendliness add an extra sparkle to the experience. As a guest, the surprises surpassed all expectations. It's a must-visit for anyone looking for an exceptional hangout destination and lodging. 🤩🤩🤩

Booked rooms for 2 days for family. Rooms are good and hospitality is good. Staff welcomes us very nicely. The only problem is there are lots of mosquitoes and cockroaches and even rats in one of the room
Rooms are ok. Not value for money. Food in the restaurant is WOREST. Overall experience is average.

places_with_reviews.name: Srikala Grand Residency
address: H2F2+C8W, K M Agraharam, Amalapuram, Andhra Pradesh 533201, India

reviews.text: Rooms are not upto mark..but ok..washrooms are not well maintained..water is being clogged..hotel location is fine..no restaurant is linked to it..we have to get food from outside
Rooms are good but the washrooms are very dirty
Rooms are smelling bad , bedsheets are not washed, the bathroom is not clean.

We stayed here for a wedding and the wedding party booked this hotel for us. It was such a pathetic experience.

The bathrooms were not cleaned, the bedsheets weren't cleaned, the room was stinking, AC wasn't working in one of the rooms. We got dirty, ditch water from the taps - upon asking the staff said it's coz they cleaned the tank and the we would get clean water after throwing  4-5 buckets - which wasn't the case.

We never got clean bedsheets in our 2 night stay - they said it was laundry.

I don't know how many hotel are there in Amalapuram but this is a worst option would not recommend to anybody.

Staff here is so kind,rooms are good,
I forgot my valuable headphones and aperson whom i won't forgot has brought it till my bus boarding point.
I felt happy thanks to this particular person.overall a good experience.

places_with_reviews.name: ROYAL PALACE
address: OPPOSITE: DCB BANK, near LIC OFFICE, Konkapalli, Amalapuram, Andhra Pradesh 533201, India

reviews.text: The hotel room showcased an exceptional commitment to guest satisfaction. The meticulous attention to cleanliness and upkeep was evident throughout, creating a welcoming and hygienic environment. The well-thought-out design and decor demonstrated a keen understanding of both style and functionality. Notably, the room's amenities were not only modern but also seamlessly integrated, enhancing the overall convenience and comfort. This positive experience was a testament to the hotel's dedication to providing a superior stay for its guests. At last I would like to suggest this place for stay with friends and family

Worst maintenance ever, worst pest control, there are too many lizards, cockroaches & spiders & insects lying around in the premises, never face such worst hotel even in other towns or villages also, the staff is also very much arrogant, please don't visit this hotel, it's not value for money, worstest maintenance you'll face & see. So waste hotel, the AC doesn't work, due to the mis management the owner is going to suffer because of such half knowledged staff who respond arrogantly, the worst thing is "SAFETY" is 0, because the windows of the room are open, there might be a chance of theft when you are not in room, so please don't stay here & save yourselves🤮🤮🤮🤮
Awesome place with fine interior. One of the best hotel to visit

places_with_reviews.name: swayamprabha service apartments
address: KNF Street, above Heritage Super Market, Amalapuram, Andhra Pradesh 533201, India

reviews.text: It's a very pleasant stay, great service and hospitality. Staff are very cooperative and responds quickly for any request.

Biggest no is that they have a limit for the service apartments. So far, i didn't come across anybody saying that they allow only 4 members for 2bhk service apartment. If thay is the case, we can simply opt for lodging rooms.

This is probably the best place for a family of 4 or more. It offers two spacious bed rooms with attached bathrooms, a full 2 BR apartment. We liked it as the place is unlike any of the cramped rooms of hotels. Service and staff are excellent. I would recommend this to anyone that is traveling with a family. This place is about substance, not style, like hotels, carpets and interiors.

We a group of 4 people travelled from Hyderabad to attend a marriage in amalapuram. Booked 2 rooms here, charged 2500/- per room but they couldn't afford to provide us with towels even after repeated requests. All they could say was 'no towels available', before our checkout.

🌟Really I had comfort stay. Delightful service.
Food quality was delicious. Staffs are so cooperative and professional. If you’re looking for comfortable stay definitely, it’s a better choice.
